short_summary: Tender for Electrical Hardware and Supplies. Department of National Defence is looking for suppliers of Power Cables.
description: Supply arrangement for Electrical Hardware and Supplies. The agreement holders have been invited to submit a proposal for the requirement.
full_summary:
### Electrical Hardware and Supplies - UPS
Government Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number
PW-22-01013193

#### Solicitation Number
W3330-23-273

#### Publication Date
2022-11-14

#### Tender Closing Date
2022-11-29T13:00:00

#### Contracting Authority
Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Description of Requirement
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply of power cables. This requirement is open to Electrical & Electronic Products Supply Arrangement (SA) holders who qualified under Stream one (1) for services in the National Capital Region.

#### Eligible Bidders
The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Anixter Canada Inc.
* Graybar Canada
* Nedco, division of Rexel Canada Electrical Inc.
* Daltco
* Wesco
* Gimpel
* Dubo
* Guillevin International Co
* Lumen
* Marchand
* KGPCo
* Newark Element 14
* Westburne-Rexel
* ECS Electrical
* Deschenes et Fils
* KVA Protection
* Robertson Electric
* Allied Electronics Canada

#### Security Requirements
No security requirements are applicable to this procurement.

#### Instructions to Bidders
Inquiries regarding this requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority. Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified SA holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that "BuyandSell.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

### Important Dates
* Tender closing date: 2022-11-29T13:00:00
* Contract authority contact information:
  - Name: [Daudji, Shaahid](mailto:shaahid.daudji@forces.gc.ca)
  - Phone: 613-410-2573

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The contract will be awarded on a competitive selective tendering basis. The contracting authority reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The notice URL and attachments are not applicable to this procurement. 

This rewritten text maintains the original information while rephrasing it in a more formal and professional
